mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR (ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER" ORDER BY MEMBER_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER"
WHERE MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = #{query}
WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR (ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER"
WHERE MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = #{query}
WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY MEMBER_NO
SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, MEMBER_ADDR FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT RESERVE_NO, ROOM_NAME, RESERVE_DATE, DECODE ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}), 0, 'X', 'O') AS REVIEW_CHECK FROM RESERVE JOIN ROOM USING (ROOM_ID) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY RESERVE_NO DESC
